flavor: "You can't be so stupid as to think this will be easy."
name: Captain Phasma
subtitle: Ruthless Tactician
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if that character has 6 or more damage on it.

flavor: "There is no escape".
name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Terror To Behold
text: Power Action - If one or more of this character's character dice were removed during an opponent's last turn this round, discard a card from your hand to roll those dice into your pool.

flavor: "Going somewhere, Solo?"
name: Greedo
subtitle: Unlucky Mercenary
text: Before this character is defeated, roll any number of his character dice into your pool. Then resolve any number of his character dice in the order of your choice.

flavor: "Today, the Rebellion dies."
name: Iden Versio
subtitle: Inferno Squad Commander
text: While one or more of this character's character dice are in your pool, your opponents cannot take additional actions.

flavor: "I use dark magick to achieve power."
name: Mother Talzin
subtitle: Nightsister Matriarch
text: After you activate this character, you may reveal the top card of a player's deck. If its cost is an odd number, turn one of that player's dice to any side.

flavor: "There has been an awakening. Have you felt it?"
name: Snoke
subtitle: Supreme Leader
text: Power Action - Deal 1 damage to another one of your characters to resolve one of its character dice showing damage, increasing its value by 2.

flavor: "Fear will keep the local systems in line."
name: Tarkin
subtitle: Grand Moff
text: Power Action - Remove 2 of your dice showing the same symbol to deal 4 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.

flavor: "Sometimes it takes courage to stick to one's beliefs."
name: Aayla Secura
subtitle: Jedi General
text: [special] - Turn one of your Blue or Red dice to any side. Turn an opponent's die to any side.

flavor: "I've been in this fight since I was six years old."
name: Cassian Andor
subtitle: Rebellion Operative
text: After you resolve this die, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent or discard the top card of a deck.

flavor: "Everything you heard about me is true."
name: Lando Calrissian
subtitle: Smooth and Sophisticated
text: Power Action - Play a Yellow vehicle from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1 and giving it Ambush. If that vehicle is the Millennium Falcon, you may activate it.

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Reluctant Instructor
text: You may resolve the shield ([shield]) sides of this die as if they were melee damage ([melee]). Power Action - Move a Blue ability from this character to another Blue character.

flavor: "Your move."
name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
subtitle: Jedi Master
text: After you activate this character, you may give a character 1 shield.

flavor: "In my book, experience outranks everything."
name: Rex
subtitle: Clone Captain
text: Before you activate this character, you may spend 1 resource or spot a Clone Trooper to take control of the battlefield.

flavor: "Do. Or do not. There is not try."
name: Yoda
subtitle: Wizened Master
text: [special]- Choose and do two of the following: gain 1 resource, give a character 1 shield, turn one of your dice to any side, or discard the top card of a deck.

flavor: "There's just something about the feeling of their helmets on my fists."
name: Zeb Orrelios
subtitle: The Last Lasat
text: You may resolve the melee damage ([melee]) sides of this die as if they were ranged damage ([ranged]).

name: Act Of Cruelty
text: Deal 1 unblockable damage to each of an opponent's damaged characters. Then discard a random card from that opponent's hand for each defeated character they have.

name: Bait and Switch
text:
Ambush.
Turn one of your dice showing a resource ([resource]) to any side.

name: Doubt
text: Reroll an opponent's die. Then that opponent either resolves that die or removes it.

flavor: "All I am surrounded by is fear. And dead men." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
name: Fear and Dead Men
text: Resolve one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) for free against each of an opponent's characters.

flavor: "I don't like you, either."
name: He Doesn't Like You
text: Remove one of your dice to remove an opponent's die.

name: Isolation
text: Spot a Blue character to remove a character die.

name: Probe
text: Look at two random cards from your opponent's hand and discard any of those cards that are events.

name: Scorched Earth
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of dice in their pool.

name: Tactical Mastery
text: Spot a Red character to take up to 2 additional actions.

flavor: "There they are! Blast them!"
name: The Best Defense...
text: Deal one of your Red characters 3 damage to remove up to 2 of an opponent's dice.

name: Witch Magick
text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck (do not rearrange them). Heal damage from a character equal to the number of cards you just revealed that cost an odd number.

name: Ataru Strike
text: Resolve one of your Blue character dice showing melee damage ([melee]), increasing its value by the number of shields on that character.

name: Easy Pickings
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove 2 dice showing the same symbol and value (ignoring modifiers and resource costs).

name: Field Medic
text: Remove 2 damage from a character.

name: First Aid
text: Heal 2 damage from a Red character, or 4 damage instead if it is the first round of the game.

name: Hit and Run
text:
Ambush.
Activate one of your Red characters.

name: Into The Garbage Chute
text: Exhaust one of your characters to remove up to 2 dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).

name: Loth-Cat and Mouse
text: Force an opponent to choose and remove one of your dice. Then remove one of their dice.

name: Loth-Wolf Bond
text: Give up to 2 of your Blue characters 1 shield each. You may activate those characters in the order of your choice.

name: Pacify
text: Remove a character die. Then give that character 2 shields.

name: Rebel Assault
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
Remove an opponent's die not showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).

name: Riposte
text: Remove any number of shields from one of your characters. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of shields you just removed.

name: All In
text: Resolve any number of your dice in the order of your choice.

name: Beguile
text: Reroll an opponent's die. Then turn one of their dice to any side. Then remove one of their dice.

name: Conflicted
text: Reroll one of your Blue character dice. Then, if that die just rolled damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), deal 2 damage to a character. Otherwise, give a character 2 shields.

name: Crash Landing
text: Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself equal to the value showing on that die.

name: Dug in
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Give 3 shields to your characters, distributed as you wish.

name: Electroshock
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove a die showing a value of 2 or lower.

name: Entangle
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove up to 2 dice showing a combined value of 3 or less.

name: Flank
text:
Play only if you have more ready characters than an opponent.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.

name: Friends in Low Places
text: Spot a Yellow character to look at an opponent's hand and discard an event from it that costs 1 or less.

name: Hasty Exit
text: Give control of the battlefield to an opponent to remove a die showing damage ([ranged],[melee], or [indirect]).

flavor: "To defeat your enemy, you must know your enemy." <cite>Maul</cite>
name: Hidden Motive
text: Choose a symbol. Then reroll an opponent's die. If that die just rolled the chosen symbol, remove it.

name: Lightsaber Pull
text: Spot a Blue character to search your deck for a Blue weapon, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Logistics
text: Spot a red character to resolve a die with the resource symbol ([resource]), increasing its value by 1.

name: Overconfidence
text: Spot a Blue character to reroll 2 dice. Then remove one of those dice with the lowest value (you choose in the case of a tie).

name: Pinned Down
text: Spot a vehicle to remove a die.

name: Truce
text:
Ambush.
Each player gains 1 resource.

name: Vandalize
text: Remove a number of your character dice equal to the cost of a support or upgrade in play to discard it.

name: Well-Connected
text: Spot a Yellow character to gain 1 resource. Each opponent may draw a card.

name: Armored Reinforcement
text: Action - Set this plot aside to search your deck or discard pile for a Red vehicle support and play it, decreasing its cost by 1. If you search your deck, shuffle it.

name: Double Down
text: You can include one additional copy of up to 2 different cards in your deck (following all other deckbuilding restrictions).

name: Solidarity
text: Include only if each character on your team is the same color and your deck contains no more than one copy of any card.

flavor: "I'm a protocol droid, specialized in etiquette, customs, translation and torture, ma'am."
text: After you deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself, you may deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.

name: Backup Muscle
text: When you play this support, place 3 damage on it. Action - Exhaust this support to move 1 damage from it to a character (this ignores shields).

name: BT-1
text: After you activate this support, deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself. Then deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.

name: Bubble Shield
text:
You may distribute indirect damage ([indirect]) to this support as if it were a character with 3 health.
Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it.

name: Déjà Vu
text: After you play an event, you may exhaust this support to play that event from your discard pile (paying its cost). You cannot take more than one additional action this turn.

name: Firespray-31
text: Power Action - Play a mod from your hand on this support, if able, decreasing its cost by 2.

name: BB-8
text: Action - Spot a vehicle support to attach this card to it as a mod upgrade (discard all upgrades on this card). If that vehicle is Black One, ready it. Use this action only once per game.

flavor: The best food this side of the Senate District!
name: Dex's Diner
text: Action - Exhaust this support and spend 1 resource to heal 1 damage from a character, or 2 damage instead if there is 6 or more damage on that character.

flavor: "Chewie we're home." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
name: Millennium Falcon
text: After you activate this support, you may activate one of your characters.

flavor: "I've never seen a jam he couldn't beep his way out of." <cite>Leia Organa</cite>
name: R2-D2
text: [special] - Draw a card. You may turn one of your dice to any side.

name: Resistance Crait Speeder
text: Before you resolve this die, if this support has no damage, you may place 1 damage on this support to increase its value by 1.

name: Hailfire Droid Tank
text: After you play a vehicle (including this support), you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. After you play a droid (including this support), you may activate it.

name: It Binds All Things
text: Before you play a Blue upgrade, you may exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.

flavor: Lined with 1,024 repulsorpods, the cavernous Senate Chamber was the meeting hall for the Galactic Senate.
name: Senate Chamber
text: Power Action - Remove one of your dice to turn a die to any side.

name: Tech Team
text: Before you play a support, you may exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.

name: Crossguard Lightsaber
text:
After you play this upgrade on Kylo Ren, deal 1 damage to a character.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if that character has 1 or more shields.

name: Darth Vader's Lightsaber
text: After you resolve this die, you may spend 1 resource to roll one of attached character's character dice into your pool. Then, if this upgrade is on Darth Vader, deal 1 damage to a character.

name: Grand Moff
text: Unique Red character only. Power Action - Use the "Claim" ability on the battlefield or switch the battlefield with a battlefield that is not being used (but was brought to the game).

name: Maul's Lightsaber
text: Blue character only. Power Action - If an opponent has no shields on all of their characters, spend 1 resource to roll this die into your pool.

name: Luke Skywalker's Lightning Rod
text: While this upgrade is attached to Luke Skywalker, you may resolve the melee damage ([melee]) sides of this die as if they were shields ([shield]).

name: Maz's Goggles
text:
To play, spot a Yellow character.
[special] - Look at an opponent's hand and discard an event from it.

name: Rex's Blaster Pistol
text:
While this upgrade is on Rex, your copies of it are non-unique.
After you activate attached character, if you control the battlefield, you may activate one of your characters.

name: Ancient Lightsaber
text: Action - Heal 2 damage from attached character. Place this upgrade on the bottom of your deck.

name: Cunning
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Resolve a special ability ([special]) on another card in play as if it were your card.

name: Dagger of Mortis
text:
Redeploy.
Before you resolve this die showing melee damage ([melee]), you may move 1 shield from a Blue character to attached character.

name: Darksaber
text:
Redeploy.
Before you resolve this die, increase its value by 1 if attached character is 15 or more points, or by 2 instead if attached character is 20 or more points.

name: Dorsal Turret
text: Modify vehicle support. After you play this upgrade, you may roll this die into your pool.

name: Force Jump
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Turn a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) to a side showing a blank ([blank]). Reroll this die instead of removing it.

flavor: The Alliance made sure to find a use for every weapon they could, from stun batons to repurposed TIE fighter cannons.
name: Handheld L-S1 Cannon
text: Attached character's upgrade limit is decreased by 1.

name: Heirloom Lightsaber
text: This upgrade has the Redeploy keyword while it's on a Blue character.

name: Hidden Blaster
text:
Ambush.
After you play this upgrade, you may remove 1 shield from a character.

name: Holdout Blaster
text: Ambush. Redeploy.

flavor: "Try them on, Grappling line, paralyzing darts, repulsor. All designed to combat the abilities of the Jedi". <cite>Fenn Rau</cite>
name: Mandalorian Vambraces
text: Action - Return this upgrade from play to its owner's hand.

name: Shoto Lightsaber
text: After you activate attached character, if it has another Blue weapon, you may give it 1 shield or remove 1 shield from a character.

flavor: The X-8 Night Sniper's computerized scope and built-in silencer made it a weapon of choice for Lando Calrissian.
name: X-8 Night Sniper
text: Ambush. Action - Spend 1 resource to turn this die to any side.

name: Bendu's Lair
subtitle: Atollon
text: Power Action - Roll this die into your pool. After you take control of this battlefield, remove its die.

name: Carbon-freezing Chamber
subtitle: Bespin
text: Claim - Choose a character die. That die cannot be rolled during the next round.

name: Comm Tower
subtitle: Scarif
text: Claim - Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1 if you spot a plot.

name: Emperor's Throne Room
subtitle: Death Star II
text: Claim - Turn one of your dice to a side showing a special ability ([special]). Then you may resolve that die.

name: Obi-Wan's Hut
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Give a Blue character 1 shield or spend 1 resource to give a non-Blue character 1 shield.

name: Outer Rim Outpost
subtitle: Nal Hutta
text: Claim - Gain 1 resource and draw a card.

name: Weapons Factory Alpha
subtitle: Cymoon 1
text: While you control this battlefield, the cost of the first vehicle you play each round is decreased by 1.

flavor: Underneath his mask of sophistication resided a brutality that manifested through the Crimson Dawn.
name: Dryden Vos
subtitle: Ruthless Crime Lord
text: [special] - Shuffle your deck and look at the top card of it. You may play that card for free.
